Author: ivborodin
Title: Press-release (20.07.2017) Intellium Announces the Pre-ICO of Its INTL Tokens
Body: The cryptocurrency-powered Investment oriented R&D Platform has announced the launch its much-awaited ICO. The 30-day-long ICO that began on July 21, 2017, provides investors and cryptocurrency community members the opportunity to purchase INTL Tokens — the first cryptocurrency to be backed by the cutting-edge technology  which gives the simplest way to get into the decentralised economy.  Intellium Tocken  During the ongoing ICO, Intellium is offering a total of 20,000,000 INTL Tokens on sale, with attractive early bird and discount offers. The investment R&D platform has fixed the base price at 0.005 ETH per 1 INTL  with applicable discounts based on Priority Pass and Pre-Sale programs. Investors buying Intellium Tokens on first 5 Days of Pre-ICO stand to benefit from +40% Bonus.  The Intellium Pre-ICO  offering an attractive opportunity for early participants to lay their hands on some of the limited offers: +40%, +30%, +20%, +10% Bonuses. This limited opportunity makes it really rewarding to participate in the ICO as soon as possible. People can use ETH, BTC, LTC crypto currencies to purchase the INTL Tokens. The Intellium team has built the Intellium Project by using the technology offered by Waves/Ethereum Blockchain Platform. The product introduces the benefits provided by blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies to the millions of decentralization enthusiasts in the world. In addition, the use of blockchain technology makes it possible to offer a certain degree of anonymity as well as complete ownership over Intellium assets.  The PR-manager of Intellium, Olga Yakubovsky, explaining the uniqueness of the platform, has said: “Intellium has set its eyes on becoming the most revolutionary project of 2017 in the cryptosphere, encouraging widespread adoption of cryptocurrency technology among the masses. In order to offer the most promising  solution, Intellium has partnered with some of the world's leading blockchain platforms like Waves and Ethereum”.  About Intellium Intellium is a blockchain-fueled Investment oriented Research and Development platform. The privately funded platform blends cryptocurrency technology with traditional Research and Development institutions to create a universal investment solution for users across the world.  Learn more about Intellium ICO at – http://intellium-ico.com/index.html Check out the Intellium ICO White Paper at – http://intellium-ico.com/White%20paper.html  Check out Intellium ICO Smart Contract at – http://wavesexplorer.com/tx/7H5SQnZ1uVAUM1zRQjv4B4nchSVXPhMuRjVg3y9XotTd Get Intellium Tokens – http://intellium-ico.com/form%20Registration/index.php  Media Contact: Contact Name: Olga Yakubovsky Contact Email: pr@intellium-ico.com  Intellium is the source of this content. Virtual currency is not legal tender, is not backed by the government, and accounts and value balances are not subject to consumer protections. This press release is for informational purposes only. The information does not constitute investment advice or an offer to invest. Related Links: Medium Reddit Intellium Bounty Program
